visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a polar column chart with custom start and end angles of the pane. The chart should have a title and subtitle, styled axes and labels, and a single data series with custom colors. The chart should also have additional configurations such as inverted orientation, polar layout, and specific margins.

title.text: Custom start and end angles of pane

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a polar column chart with an inverted orientation and a polar layout. The chart's pane is customized with start and end angles of 45 and 315 degrees, respectively. The title and subtitle are set with HTML-formatted text to highlight the start and end angles. The x-axis and y-axis are configured with specific settings, such as tick intervals and label positions. The plot options include series-specific configurations like point and group padding, and data labels are enabled and positioned inside the columns. The single data series is defined with colorByPoint set to true, ensuring each data point is colored differently, and the data array contains the values for the series.
